title: Thin Stylish Geometric Serif
content:
Would love it if someone could identify this serif font, I've been looking for it for ages.

I'd describe it as a modern, stylish serif font, with thin geometric serifs, used in a lot of youth culture and hipster contexts. I've included a photo of it from the Australian counter-culture surf magazine, STAB. Sorry it's a photograph so it might be slightly warped but you'll get the idea.

Any similar fonts would be appreciated too.

Cheers!
